memberdef.argsstring: (hmc5883l_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, const uint8_t byte)
memberdef.name: hmc5883l_i2c_write_byte_to

briefdescription.para: HMC5883L I2C write byte to register address transaction.

parameterdescription.para: HMC5883L register address to write to.

memberdef.argsstring: (hmc5883l_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *const byte)
memberdef.name: hmc5883l_i2c_read_byte_from

briefdescription.para: HMC5883L I2C read byte from register address transaction.

parameterdescription.para: HMC5883L register address to read from.

memberdef.argsstring: (hmc5883l_handle_t handle, const uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *buffer, const uint8_t size)
memberdef.name: hmc5883l_i2c_read_from

briefdescription.para: HMC5883L I2C read from register address transaction. This is a write and then read process.

parameterdescription.para: HMC5883L register address to read from.
Length of buffer to store results from read transaction.

detaileddescription.para: ESP-IDF driver for HMC5883L digital compass sensor
